text: The City Central Library is located in Chikkadpally and it is the biggest library after state Central library with 1000 students and 500 readers visit library every day. It works on all days (except public holidays and Mondays) from 8am to 8pm . == History == It was established in 1960. == Facilities == It also has an auditorium to conduct motivational speeches and inspiring lectures from dignitaries in different field of expertise. ==References== Category:Culture of Hyderabad, India Category:Libraries in Hyderabad, India
title: City Central Library
